title: Science Communication Design Utilizing Digital Multimodal Composition (DMC) and Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool proficiency and foundational science knowledge
context.additional_context: Enhancing multi-modal content creation and AI integration competencies in VR/simulation environments for cultivating experts in science and technology fields

learning_goals: Learners can design digital multimodal composition (DMC) strategies to effectively convey scientific concepts.
Learners can create science data visualization and storytelling content using generative AI tools.
Learners can complete complex DMC projects while receiving step-by-step feedback according to scaffolding instructional methods.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
